title: Can You Type Fast with Long Nails? Tips and Tricks
description: Long nails don't have to ruin your WPM. Learn how to adapt your typing style for a fresh manicure.
author: Free Online Typing Team
content:
The Flat Finger Technique

Instead of using the tips of your fingers (which hits the nail), flatten your fingers slightly to use the pad.

Keycap Profile

Flat keycaps (like XDA or DSA profile) are often easier for long nails than sculpted ones (like Cherry or OEM).
